Sentencas: Recently, zirconia films have attracted considerable attention because of their potential applications in solid oxide fuel cells and as thermal barrier coatings and oxygen sensors.
Titulo: Formation of zirconia films by the aerosol gas deposition method

Sentencas: Herein, we report that high-density zirconia films can be formed at room temperature by using the aerosol gas deposition (AGD) technique and discuss the conditions required for film formation.
Titulo: Formation of zirconia films by the aerosol gas deposition method

Sentencas: The experimental results indicate that the particle size and specific surface area of the zirconia powder used determine the success of film fabrication by AGD.
Titulo: Formation of zirconia films by the aerosol gas deposition method

Sentencas: Films are successfully formed when the mean particle size and specific surface area of the powder are in the range 2.1-3.5 pm and 4.4-6.5 m(2)/g, respectively.
Titulo: Formation of zirconia films by the aerosol gas deposition method
Formation of zirconia films by the aerosol gas deposition method
Formation of zirconia films by the aerosol gas deposition method
